arabicText: ۞ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّمَا غَنِمْتُم مِّن شَىْءٍۢ فَأَنَّ لِلَّهِ خُمُسَهُۥ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ وَٱلْيَتَـٰمَىٰ وَٱلْمَسَـٰكِينِ وَٱبْنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ إِن كُنتُمْ ءَامَنتُم بِٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ عَبْدِنَا يَوْمَ ٱلْفُرْقَانِ يَوْمَ ٱلْتَقَى ٱلْجَمْعَانِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	know	that	whatever	you	take	as	war	
booty,	a	 fifth	of	 that	belongs	 to	Allah and	
His	 Noble	 Messenger,	 and	 to	 relatives,	
and	 orphans,	 and	 the	 needy,	 and	 the	
traveler	 - if	 you	 have	 accepted	 faith	 in	
Allah and	 what	 We	 sent	 down	 to	 Our	
bondman	 on	 the	 decisive	 day	 - the	 day	
when	 two	 armies	 had	 met;	 and	 Allah is	
Able	to	do	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jān	lo	ke	jo	kuchh	ghanimat	lo	to	uska	
pāñchwāñ	hissa	khās	Allah	aur	Rasool	aur		
qarābat	 wāloñ	 aur	 yateemoñ	 aur	
mohtājoñ	 aur	 musafiroñ	 ka	 hai	 agar	 tum	
Imān	lāye	ho	Allah	par	aur	us	par	jo	hum	
ne	 apne	 bande	 par	 faisle	 ke	 din	 utāra	 jis	
din	 dono	 faujeiñ	 mili	 theiñ	 aur	 Allah	 sab	
kuchh	kar	sakta hai.

arabicText: إِذْ أَنتُم بِٱلْعُدْوَةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَهُم بِٱلْعُدْوَةِ ٱلْقُصْوَىٰ وَٱلرَّكْبُ أَسْفَلَ مِنكُمْ ۚ وَلَوْ تَوَاعَدتُّمْ لَٱخْتَلَفْتُمْ فِى ٱلْمِيعَـٰدِ ۙ وَلَـٰكِن لِّيَقْضِىَ ٱللَّهُ أَمْرًۭا كَانَ مَفْعُولًۭا لِّيَهْلِكَ مَنْ هَلَكَ عَنۢ بَيِّنَةٍۢ وَيَحْيَىٰ مَنْ حَىَّ عَنۢ بَيِّنَةٍۢ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَسَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
When	you	were	on	the	near	bank	and	the	
disbelievers	 on	 the	 far	 bank,	 and	 the	
caravan	below	you;	and	had	you	made	an	
agreement	 between	 one	 another,	 you	
would	 have	 failed	 to	 reach	 on	 the	
appointed	 time	- but	 this	is	in	 order	 that	
Allah may	 complete	 a	 thing	 that	must	 be	
done	- that	he	who	dies	may	die	by	a	clear	
proof	and	he	who	lives	may	live	by	a	clear	
proof;	 and	 indeed	 Allah is	 surely,	 All	
Hearing,	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jab	 tum	 nāle	 ke	 us	 kināre	 they	 aur	 kāfir	
parle	 kināre	 aur	 qāfila	 tum	 se	 tarāi	meiñ	
aur	agar	tum	āapas		meiñ	koi	w’āda		karte	
to	zaroor	waqt	par	barābar	na	pahuñchte	
lekin	 yeh	 is	 liye	 ke	 Allah	 poora	 kare	 jo	
kām	 hona	 hai	 ke	 jo	 halāk	 ho	 daleel	 se	
halāk	 ho	aur	jo	jiye	 daleel	 se	jiye	aur	 beshak		Allah	zaroor	sunta	jānta	hai.

arabicText: إِذْ يُرِيكَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِى مَنَامِكَ قَلِيلًۭا ۖ وَلَوْ أَرَىٰكَهُمْ كَثِيرًۭا لَّفَشِلْتُمْ وَلَتَنَـٰزَعْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَمْرِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَلَّمَ ۗ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
englishTranslationText:
When	O	dear	Prophet,	Allah used	to	show	
the	 disbelievers	 in	 your	 dream	 as	 only	 a	
few	*;	and	O	Muslims,	had	He	shown	them	
to	you	as	many,	you	would	have	certainly	
lost	courage	and	disputed	over	 the	affair,	
but	Allah rescued	(you);	indeed	He	knows	
what	lies	within	the	hearts. (*	They	numbered	more	but	their	actual	strength	was	equal	to	only	a	
few.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Jab	 ke	 aey	 Mehboob!	 Allah	 tumheiñ		
kāfiroñ	 ko	 tumhāri	 khuwāb	 meiñ	 thoda	 dikhāta	 tha	 aur	 aey	 musalmano!	 agar	 woh	 tumheiñ		
bahut	karke	dikhata	to	zaroor	tum	buzdili	karte	aur	mu'āmle	meiñ	jhagda	dālte	magar	Allah	ne	
bacha	liya	be-shak		woh	diloñ	ki	bāt	jānta	hai.

arabicText: وَإِذْ يُرِيكُمُوهُمْ إِذِ ٱلْتَقَيْتُمْ فِىٓ أَعْيُنِكُمْ قَلِيلًۭا وَيُقَلِّلُكُمْ فِىٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ لِيَقْضِىَ ٱللَّهُ أَمْرًۭا كَانَ مَفْعُولًۭا ۗ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ ٱلْأُمُورُ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	at	the	time	of	fighting	He	made	the	disbelievers	seem	few	to	you,	and	you	as	few	in	
their	sight,	in	order	for	Allah to	conclude	the	matter	that	must	be	done;	and	towards	Allah is	the	
return	of	all	matters.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	ladte	waqt	 tumheiñ		kāfir	 thode	karke	dikhaye	aur	 tumheiñ unki	nigahoñ	meiñ	 thoda	
kiya	ke	Allah	poora	kare	jo	kām	hona	hai	aur	Allah	ki	taraf	sab	kāmoñ	ki	ruju'	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِذَا لَقِيتُمْ فِئَةًۭ فَٱثْبُتُوا۟ وَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًۭا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	who	Believe!	When	 you	meet	an	army,	 hold	 firm	and	 remember	Allah profusely,	in	
order	that	you	succeed.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo!	Jab	kisi	fauj	se	tumhāra	muqābla	ho	to	sābit	qadam	raho	aur	Allah	ki	yād	bahut	
karo	ke	tum	murād	ko	pahuñcho.

arabicText: وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَا تَنَـٰزَعُوا۟ فَتَفْشَلُوا۟ وَتَذْهَبَ رِيحُكُمْ ۖ وَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	obey	Allah and	His	Noble	Messenger,	
and	 do	 not	 dispute	 with	 one	 another	 for	
you	 will	 lose	 courage	 again	 and	 your	
strength	 will	 be	 lost,	 and	 patiently	
endure;	 indeed	 Allah is	 with	 those	 who	
patiently	endure.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	aur	uske	Raool	ka	ḥukm		māno	
aur	 āapas	 	 meiñ	 jhagdo	 nahi	 ke	 phir	
buzdili	 karoge	 aur	 tumhāri	 bandhi	 huwi	
hawā	 jāti	 rahegi	 aur	 sabr	 karo	 be-shak		
Allah	sabr	wāloñ	ke	sāth	hai

arabicText: وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِينَ خَرَجُوا۟ مِن دِيَـٰرِهِم بَطَرًۭا وَرِئَآءَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا يَعْمَلُونَ مُحِيطٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 do	 not	 be	 like	 those	 who	 came	 out	
from	their	houses	proudly,	and	to	be	seen	
by	 men,	 and	 they	 prevent	 people	 from	
Allah’s	 way;	 and	 all	 their	 actions	 are	
within	Allah’s	control.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	jaise	na	hona	jo	apne	ghar	se	nikle	
itrāte	aur	logoñ	ke	dikhāne	ko	aur	Allah	ki	
rāh	 se	 rokte	 aur	 unke	 sab	 kām	 Allah	 ke	
qābu	meiñ	haiñ.

arabicText: وَإِذْ زَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ وَقَالَ لَا غَالِبَ لَكُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ مِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَإِنِّى جَارٌۭ لَّكُمْ ۖ فَلَمَّا تَرَآءَتِ ٱلْفِئَتَانِ نَكَصَ عَلَىٰ عَقِبَيْهِ وَقَالَ إِنِّى بَرِىٓءٌۭ مِّنكُمْ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰ مَا لَا تَرَوْنَ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ ٱللَّهَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 Satan	 made	 their	 deeds	 seem	
good	in	 their	sight	and	said,	“This	day	no	
one	 can	 overpower	 you,	 and	 you	 are	
under	 my	 protection”;	 so	 when	 the	 two	
armies	 came	 face	 to	 face,	 he	 scrambled	
back	 and	 said,	 “I	 am	 unconcerned	 with	
you	- I	can	see	what	is	not	visible	to	you	- I	
fear	 Allah”;	 and	 Allah’s	 punishment	 is	
severe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jabke	 shaitān	 ne	 un	 ki	 nigah meiñ	
unke	 kām	 bhale	 kar	 dikhaye	 aur	 bola	 āaj	
tum	par	koi	shakhs	ghalib	āane		wāla	nahi	
aur	tum	meri	panāh	meiñ	ho	to	jab	donoñ	
lashkar	 āamne	 sāmne	 huwe	 ulte	 pāoñ	
bhāga	 aur	 bola	 maiñ	 tum	 se	 alag	 hooñ	
maiñ	woh	dekhta	hooñ	jo	 tumheiñ		nazar	
nahi	 āata	 maiñ	 Allah	 se	 darta	 hooñ	 aur	
Allah	ka	‘aƶāb	sakht	hai.

arabicText: إِذْ يَقُولُ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ وَٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ غَرَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ دِينُهُمْ ۗ وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
When	 the	 hypocrites	and	 those	in	whose	
hearts	 is	 a	 disease	 were	 saying,	 “These	
Muslims	are	proud	 of	 their	 religion”;	and	
whoever	trusts	Allah,	then	indeed	Allah is	
Almighty,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Jab	kehte	they	munafiq	aur	woh	jinke	diloñ	meiñ	āzār	(bimāri)	hai	ke	yeh	Musalman	apne	Deen	
par	maghroor	haiñ	aur	jo	Allah	par	bharosa	kare	to	be-shak		Allah	ghalib	Hikmat	wāla	hai.

arabicText: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰٓ إِذْ يَتَوَفَّى ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۙ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يَضْرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمْ وَأَدْبَـٰرَهُمْ وَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابَ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	you	see	the	angels	when	they	are	removing	the	souls	of	the	disbelievers,	hitting	them	on	
their	faces	and	their	backs;	“Taste	more	of the	punishment	of	the	fire!”	(Punishment	in	the	grave	
is	proven	by	this	verse.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 kabhi	 tu	dekhe	jab	Firishte	 kāfiroñ	 ki	jān	nikālte	haiñ	mār	 rahe	haiñ	unke	muñh	par	aur	
unki	peeth	par	aur	chakhkho	āag	ka	‘aƶāb

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيْسَ بِظَلَّـٰمٍۢ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
englishTranslationText:
“This	is	the	recompense	of	what	your	own	hands	have	sent	ahead,	and	Allah does	not	oppress	
His	bondmen.”
romanUrduTranslationText: . Yeh	badla	hai	uska	jo	tumhāre	hāthon	ne	āage	bheja	aur	Allah	bandon	par	zulm	nahi	karta

arabicText: كَدَأْبِ ءَالِ فِرْعَوْنَ ۙ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِىٌّۭ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
englishTranslationText:
Like	the	ways	of	Firaun’s	people,	and	those	before	them;	they	disbelieved	in	the	signs	of	Allah -
therefore	Allah seized	 them	on	account	of	 their	sins;	indeed	Allah is	Most	Powerful,	Severe	in	
Punishing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Jaise	fir'aun	wāloñ	aur	un	se	agloñ	ka	dastoor	woh	Allah	ki	āayaton		se	munkir	huwe	to	Allah	ne	
unheiñ	unke	gunahoñ	par	pakda	be-shak		Allah	quwwat	wāla	sakht	‘aƶāb	wāla	hai.

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمْ يَكُ مُغَيِّرًۭا نِّعْمَةً أَنْعَمَهَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُوا۟ مَا بِأَنفُسِهِمْ ۙ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
This	is	because	Allah does	not	change	the	
favour	He	has	bestowed	upon	any	people	
until	 they	 first	 change	 themselves,	 and	
indeed	Allah is	All	Hearing,	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	is	liye	ke	Allah	kisi	qaum	se	jo	ne'mat	
unheiñ	 di	 thi	 badalta	 nahi	 jab	 tak	 woh	
khud	 na	 badal	 jāyeñ	 aur	 be-shak Allah	
sunta	jānta	hai

arabicText: كَدَأْبِ ءَالِ فِرْعَوْنَ ۙ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَهْلَكْنَـٰهُم بِذُنُوبِهِمْ وَأَغْرَقْنَآ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ وَكُلٌّۭ كَانُوا۟ ظَـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
. Like	 the	 ways	 of	 Firaun’s	 people	 and	
those	 before	 them;	 they	 denied	 the	 signs	
of	Allah - We	therefore	destroyed	them	on	
account	of	their	sins	and	We	drowned	the	
people	of	Firaun;	and	they	all	were	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jaise	 fir'aun	 wāloñ	 aur	 un	 se	 agloñ	 ka	
dastoor	 unhoñ	 ne	 apne	 Rab	 ki	 āayateiñ	
jhutlayiñ	 to	 hum	 ne	 unko	 un	 ke	gunahoñ	
ke	 sabab	 halāk	 kiya	 aur	 hum	 ne	 fir'aun	
wāloñ	 ko	 dubo	 diya	 aur	 woh	 sab	 zālim	
they

arabicText: إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 the	 worst	 beasts	 in	 the	 sight	 of	
Allah are	 the	 people	 who	 disbelieve	 and	
do	not	accept	faith.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		sab	jānwaron	meiñ	bad-tar	Allah	
ke	 nazdeek	woh	 haiñ	 Jinhoñ	 ne	 kufr	 kiya	
aur	Imān	nahi	lāte.

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ عَـٰهَدتَّ مِنْهُمْ ثُمَّ يَنقُضُونَ عَهْدَهُمْ فِى كُلِّ مَرَّةٍۢ وَهُمْ لَا يَتَّقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	with	whom	you	made	a	treaty,	then	
they	break	their	agreement	each	time	and	
do	not	fear
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jin	se	tum	ne	mu'āhida	kiya	tha	phir	
har	bār	apna	‘ahed	tod	dete	haiñ	aur	darte	
nahi

arabicText: فَإِمَّا تَثْقَفَنَّهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَرْبِ فَشَرِّدْ بِهِم مَّنْ خَلْفَهُمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. So	if	you	find	them	in	battle,	kill	them	in	a	
manner	 which	makes	 those	 behind	 them	
scamper	 back,	in	 the	 hope	 that	 they	may	
learn	a	lesson.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	agar	tum	unheiñ	kahiñ	ladāi	meiñ	pāo	
to	 unheiñ	 aisa	 qatl	 karo	 jis	 se	 unke	 pasmāndoñ	 ko	 bhagāo	 is	 ummeed	 par	 ke	
shayad	unheiñ	ibrat	ho

arabicText: وَإِمَّا تَخَافَنَّ مِن قَوْمٍ خِيَانَةًۭ فَٱنۢبِذْ إِلَيْهِمْ عَلَىٰ سَوَآءٍ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْخَآئِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 if	 you	 apprehend	 treachery	 from	 a	
nation,	 then	 throw	 back	 their	 treaty	
towards	them	in	reciprocity;	indeed	Allah
does	not	like	the	treacherous.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 agar	 tum	 kisi	 qaum	 se	 dagha	 (‘ahed	
shikni)	 ka	 andesha	 karo	 to	 unka	 ‘ahed	
unki	 taraf	pheñk	do	barābari	par	be-shak		
daghā	wāle	Allah	ko	pasand	nahi.

arabicText: وَلَا يَحْسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ سَبَقُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ لَا يُعْجِزُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	never	may	the	disbelievers	pride	that	
they	have	escaped;	indeed	they	can	never	
defeat.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hargiz	kāfir	is	ghamand	meiñ	na	raheiñ	ke	woh	hāth	se	nikal	gaye	be-shak		woh	ājiz	nahi	
karte.

arabicText: وَأَعِدُّوا۟ لَهُم مَّا ٱسْتَطَعْتُم مِّن قُوَّةٍۢ وَمِن رِّبَاطِ ٱلْخَيْلِ تُرْهِبُونَ بِهِۦ عَدُوَّ ٱللَّهِ وَعَدُوَّكُمْ وَءَاخَرِينَ مِن دُونِهِمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُهُمْ ۚ وَمَا تُنفِقُوا۟ مِن شَىْءٍۢ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ يُوَفَّ إِلَيْكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تُظْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	keep	ready	for	them	the	maximum	of	forces	you	can	and	the	maximum	number	of	horses	
you	can	keep	tethered,	in	order	to	instil	awe	in	the	hearts	of	those	who	are	the	enemies	of	Allah
and	 who	 are	 your	 enemies,	 and	 in	 the	 hearts	 of	 some	 others	 whom	 you	 do	 not	 know;	Allah
knows	them;	and	whatever	you	spend	in	Allah's	cause	will	be	repaid	to	you	in	full	and	you	will	
never	be	in	a	loss.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	unke	liye	 tayyār	rakho	jo	quwwat	 tumheiñ ban	pade	aur	jitne	ghode	bāndh	sako	ke	unse	
unke	 diloñ	meiñ	 dhāk	 bithāo	jo	Allah	 ke	dushman	aur	 tumhāre	 dushman	 haiñ	aur	 unke	 siwa	
kuchh	auroñ	ke	diloñ	meiñ	jinheiñ	tum	nahi	jānte	Allah	unheiñ	jānta	hai	aur	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	jo	
kuchh	kharch	karoge	tumheiñ		poora	diya	jāye	ga	aur	kisi	tarah	ghāte	meiñ	na	rahoge	.

arabicText: ۞ وَإِن جَنَحُوا۟ لِلسَّلْمِ فَٱجْنَحْ لَهَا وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	they	incline	towards	peace,	you	too	lean	towards	it,	and	trust	Allah;	indeed	He	only	is	the	
All	Hearing,	the	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	woh	sulah	ki	taraf	jhukeñ	to	tum	bhi	jhuko	aur	Allah	par	bharosa	rakho	be-shak		wohi	
hai	sunta	jānta

arabicText: وَإِن يُرِيدُوٓا۟ أَن يَخْدَعُوكَ فَإِنَّ حَسْبَكَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَيَّدَكَ بِنَصْرِهِۦ وَبِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 if	 they	 wish	 to	 deceive	 you,	 then	
indeed	Allah is	Sufficient	for	you;	it	is	He	
Who	 has	 given	 you	 strength,	 with	 His	
help	and	with	the	Muslims.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 agar	 woh	 tumheiñ	 	 fareb	 diya	
chāheñ	 to	 be-shak	 	 Allah	 tumheiñ	 	 kāfi	
hai	 wohi	 hai	 jis	 ne	 tumheiñ	 	 zor	 diya	
apni	madad	ka	aur	Musalmanoñ	ka.

arabicText: وَأَلَّفَ بَيْنَ قُلُوبِهِمْ ۚ لَوْ أَنفَقْتَ مَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًۭا مَّآ أَلَّفْتَ بَيْنَ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَلَّفَ بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 has	 created	 harmony	 among	 their	
hearts;	if	you	had	spent	all	that	is	in	the	
earth	 you	 could	 not	 have	 created	
harmony	 among	 their	 hearts,	 but	Allah
has	 created	 harmony	 among	 them;	
indeed	He	only	is	Almighty,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	unke	diloñ	meiñ	mail	kar	diya	(Ulfat	
paida	 kar	 di)	 agar	 tum	 zameen	meiñ	jo	
kuchh	 hai	 sab	 kharch	 kar	 dete	 unke	 dil	
na	 mila	 sakte	 lekin	 Allah	 ne	 unke	 dil	
mila	 diye	 be-shak	 	 wohi	 hai	 ghalib	
hikmat	wāla.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ حَسْبُكَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 Herald	 of	 the	 Hidden!	 Allah is	
Sufficient	 for	you	and	all	 these	Muslims	
who	follow	you.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Ghaib	 ki	 Khabreiñ	 batāne	 wāle	
(Nabi)!	 Allah	 tumheiñ	 	 kāfi	 hai	 aur	 yeh	
jitne	Musalman	tumhāre	pairo	huwe.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ حَرِّضِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ عَلَى ٱلْقِتَالِ ۚ إِن يَكُن مِّنكُمْ عِشْرُونَ صَـٰبِرُونَ يَغْلِبُوا۟ مِا۟ئَتَيْنِ ۚ وَإِن يَكُن مِّنكُم مِّا۟ئَةٌۭ يَغْلِبُوٓا۟ أَلْفًۭا مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَوْمٌۭ لَّا يَفْقَهُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 Herald	 of	 the	 Hidden!	 Urge	 the	
believers	 to	 fight;	 if	 there	 are	 twenty	
persevering	men	 among	 you,	 they shall	
overcome	two	hundred;	and	if	there	are	
a	 hundred	 among	 you,	 they	 shall	
overcome	 a	 thousand	 disbelievers	
because	 the	 disbelievers	 are	 a	 people	
who	do	not	have	sense.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aey	 Ghaib	 ki	 Khabreiñ	 Batane	 Wāle	
(Nabi)! Musalmanoñ	 ko	 jihād	 ki	
targheeb	do	agar	tum	meiñ	ke	bees	sabr	
wāle	hoñge	do	sau	par	ghalib	honge	aur	
agar	tum	meiñ	ke	sau	hoñ	to	kāfiroñ	ke	
hazār	par	ghalib	āayeñge	is	liye	ke	woh	
samajh	nahi	rakhte

arabicText: ٱلْـَٔـٰنَ خَفَّفَ ٱللَّهُ عَنكُمْ وَعَلِمَ أَنَّ فِيكُمْ ضَعْفًۭا ۚ فَإِن يَكُن مِّنكُم مِّا۟ئَةٌۭ صَابِرَةٌۭ يَغْلِبُوا۟ مِا۟ئَتَيْنِ ۚ وَإِن يَكُن مِّنكُمْ أَلْفٌۭ يَغْلِبُوٓا۟ أَلْفَيْنِ بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	 now	 Allah has	 made	 an	 ease	 upon	
you	and	He	knows	that	you	are	weak;	so	
if	 there	are	a	hundred	persevering	men	
among	 you,	 they	 shall	 overcome	 two	
hundred;	 and	 if	 there	 are	 a	 thousand	
among	 you,	 they	 shall	 overcome	 two	
thousand	by	the	command	of	Allah;	and	Allah is	with	those	who	patiently	endure.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ab	Allah	ne	tum	par	se	takhfeef	farma	di	
aur	usey	ma'loom	hai	ke	tum	kamzor	ho	
to	agar	 tum	meiñ	sau	sabr	wāle	hoñ	do	
sau	par	ghalib	āayeñge aur	agar	tum	meiñ	ke	hazār	hoñ to	do	hazār	par	ghalib	hoñge	Allah	ke	
ḥukm		se	aur	Allah	sabr	wāloñ	ke	sāth	hai.

arabicText: مَا كَانَ لِنَبِىٍّ أَن يَكُونَ لَهُۥٓ أَسْرَىٰ حَتَّىٰ يُثْخِنَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ تُرِيدُونَ عَرَضَ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
It	does	not	befit	any	Prophet	to	capture	the	disbelievers	alive	until	he	has	profusely	shed	their	
blood	in	the	land;	you	people	desire	the	wealth	of	this	world;	and	Allah wills	the	Hereafter,	and	
Allah is	Almighty,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kisi	Nabi ko	lāiq	nahi	ke	kāfiroñ	ko	zinda	qaid	kare	jab	tak	zameen	meiñ	unka	khooñ	khoob	na	
bahāye	tum	log	duniya	ka	māl	chāhte	ho	aur	Allah	āakhirat	chāhta	hai	aur	Allah	ghalib	Hikmat	
wāla	hai.

arabicText: لَّوْلَا كِتَـٰبٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ سَبَقَ لَمَسَّكُمْ فِيمَآ أَخَذْتُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Had	Allah not	pre-destined	a	matter	then,	O	Muslims,	a	terrible	punishment	would	have	come	
upon	you	due	to	the	ransom	you	took	from	the	disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Agar	Allah	pehle	ek	bāt	likh	na	chuka	hota	to	aey	Musalmano!	tum	ne	jo	kāfiroñ	se	badle	ka	māl	
le	liya	us	meiñ	tum	par	bada	‘aƶāb	āata.

arabicText: فَكُلُوا۟ مِمَّا غَنِمْتُمْ حَلَـٰلًۭا طَيِّبًۭا ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
. Therefore	benefit	 from	 the	booty	you	have	received,	lawful	and	good;	and	keep	 fearing	Allah;	
indeed	Allah is	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	khāo	jo	ghanimat	tumheiñ		mili	halāl	pakeeza	aur	Allah	se	darte	raho	be-shak		Allah	bakhsh	
ne	wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ قُل لِّمَن فِىٓ أَيْدِيكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَسْرَىٰٓ إِن يَعْلَمِ ٱللَّهُ فِى قُلُوبِكُمْ خَيْرًۭا يُؤْتِكُمْ خَيْرًۭا مِّمَّآ أُخِذَ مِنكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	 Herald	 of	 the	 Hidden!	 Say	 to	 the	
captives	 whom	 you	 possess,	 “If	 Allah
finds	 any	 goodness	 in	 your	 hearts,	 He	
will	give	you	better	than	what	has	been	
taken	 from	 you,	 and	 will	 forgive	 you;	
and	 Allah is	 Oft	 Forgiving,	 Most	
Merciful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Ghaib	 ki	 Khabreiñ	 Batane	 Wāle	
(Nabi)!		Jo	qaidi	tumhāre	hāth	meiñ	haiñ	
un	 se	 farmāo	 agar	 Allah	 ne	 tumhāre	
diloñ	 meiñ	 bhalāi	 jāni	 to	 jo	 tum	 se	 liya	
gayā	 is	 se	 behtar	 tumheiñ ‘aṭa	
farmāyega	aur	tumheiñ bakhsh	dega	aur	
Allah	bakhsh	ne	wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: وَإِن يُرِيدُوا۟ خِيَانَتَكَ فَقَدْ خَانُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبْلُ فَأَمْكَنَ مِنْهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	 if	 they	 wish	 to	 deceive	 you,	 they	
have	 already	 been	 disloyal	 to	 Allah,	
because	 of	 which	 He	 has	 given	 these	
disbelievers	in	your	control;	and	Allah is	
All	Knowing,	Wise
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 aey	 Mehboob!	 Agar	 woh	 tum	 se	
dagha	chāheñ	ge	to	is	se	pehle	Allah	hi	ki	
khiyānat	 kar	 chuke	 haiñ	 jis	 par	 us	 ne	
itne	 tumhāre	 qābu	 meiñ	 de	 diye	 aur	
Allah	jānne	wāla	hikmat	wāla	hai.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَهَاجَرُوا۟ وَجَـٰهَدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاوَوا۟ وَّنَصَرُوٓا۟ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلِيَآءُ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَلَمْ يُهَاجِرُوا۟ مَا لَكُم مِّن وَلَـٰيَتِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ حَتَّىٰ يُهَاجِرُوا۟ ۚ وَإِنِ ٱسْتَنصَرُوكُمْ فِى ٱلدِّينِ فَعَلَيْكُمُ ٱلنَّصْرُ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ قَوْمٍۭ بَيْنَكُمْ وَبَيْنَهُم مِّيثَـٰقٌۭ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	accepted	faith	and	left	
their	 homes	 and	 belongings	 for	 Allah,	
and	 fought	 with	 their	 wealth	 and	 their	
lives	 in	 Allah's	 cause,	 and	 those	 who	
gave	 shelter	and	 provided	 help,	are	 the	
heirs	 of	 one	 another;	 and	 those	 who	
believed	but	did	not	leave	their	homes	-
you	 have	 no	 right	 in	 their	 estates	 until	
they	migrate;	and	if	they	seek	help	from	
you	 in the	 matter	 of	 religion	 then	 it	 is	
your	 duty	 to	 provide	 help,	 except	
against	 the	 people	 between	 whom	 and	
you	 is	 a	 treaty;	 and	 Allah sees	 your	
deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	 	 jo	 Imān	 lāye	 aur	 Allah	 ke	 liye	
ghar	 bār	 chhode	 aur	 Allah	 ki	 rāh	 meiñ	
apne	 mālon	 aur	 jānon	 se	 lade aur	 woh	
Jinhoñ	ne	jagah	di	aur	madad	ki	woh	ek	
doosre	 ke	 wāris	 haiñ	 aur	 woh	 jo	 Imān	
lāye	aur	hijrat	na	ki	tumheiñ		unka	tarka	
kuchh	 náhi	 pahuñchta	 jab	 tak	 hijrat	 na	
kareñ	 aur	 agar	 woh	 deen	 meiñ	 tum	 se	
madad	chāheiñ	 to	 tum	par	madad	dena	
wājib	 hai	 magar	 aisi	 qaum	 par	 ke	 tum	
meiñ	 un	 meiñ	 mu'āhida	 hai	 aur	 Allah	
tumhāre	kām	dekh	raha	hai.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلِيَآءُ بَعْضٍ ۚ إِلَّا تَفْعَلُوهُ تَكُن فِتْنَةٌۭ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَفَسَادٌۭ كَبِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
. And	the	disbelievers	are	the	heirs	of	one	
another	- if	you	do	not	do	so,	 there	will	
be	turmoil	in	the	land and	a	great	chaos.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kāfir	āapas meiñ	ek	doosre	ke	wāris	
haiñ- aisa	na	karoge to, zameen	meiñ	fitna	aur	bada	fasād	hoga.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَهَاجَرُوا۟ وَجَـٰهَدُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاوَوا۟ وَّنَصَرُوٓا۟ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ حَقًّۭا ۚ لَّهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌۭ وَرِزْقٌۭ كَرِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
. And	those	who	believed	and	migrated	and	fought	in	Allah's	cause,	and	those	who	gave	shelter	
and	provided	help	- it	is	they	who	are	the	true	believers;	for	them	is	pardon,	and	an	honourable	
sustenance.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jo	Imān	lāye	aur	hijrat	ki	aur	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	lade	aur	Jinhoñ	ne	jagah	di	aur	madad	
ki	wohi	sachche	Imān	wāle	haiñ	unke	liye	bakhshish	hai	aur	‘izzat	ki	rozi.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدُ وَهَاجَرُوا۟ وَجَـٰهَدُوا۟ مَعَكُمْ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ مِنكُمْ ۚ وَأُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَرْحَامِ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلَىٰ بِبَعْضٍۢ فِى كِتَـٰبِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	afterwards	believed and	migrated	and	fought	along	with	you	- they	too	are	from	
among	 you;	 and	 family	 members	(blood	 relations)	 are	 nearer	 to	 one	 another	 in	 the	 Book	 of	
Allah;	indeed	Allah knows	everything.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	b’ad	ko	Imān	lāye	aur	hijrat	ki	aur	tumhāre	sāth	Jihād	kiya	woh	bhi	tumhiñ	meiñ	se	haiñ	
aur	rishte	wāle	ek	doosre	se	ziyada	nazdeek	haiñ	Allah	ki	kitāb	meiñ	be-shak Allah	sab	kuchh	
jānta	hai
